address.zh-TW: 台北市萬華區廣州街211號
address.en: No. 211, Guangzhou St, Wanhua District, Taipei City

description.zh-TW: 台北最著名的古廟之一，主祀觀世音菩薩，融合多元信仰。
description.en: One of the most famous temples in Taipei, dedicated to Guanyin and featuring diverse religious practices.

history.zh-TW: 創建於清朝，歷經多次重建，是台灣宗教文化重鎮。
history.en: Founded in the Qing Dynasty, rebuilt several times, a major center of religious culture in Taiwan.

address.zh-TW: 台北市中山區民權東路二段109號
address.en: No. 109, Minquan E. Rd. Sec. 2, Zhongshan District, Taipei City

description.zh-TW: 台北著名的關聖帝君廟宇，香火鼎盛。
description.en: A famous temple in Taipei dedicated to Lord Guan, always bustling with worshippers.

history.zh-TW: 創建於1967年，是現代台灣重要的信仰中心。
history.en: Founded in 1967, an important modern religious center in Taiwan.

address.zh-TW: 台北市大同區迪化街一段61號
address.en: No. 61, Dihua St. Sec. 1, Datong District, Taipei City

description.zh-TW: 以月老聞名的城隍廟，信眾眾多。
description.en: Famous for its Matchmaker God, attracts many worshippers.

history.zh-TW: 創建於1856年，為大稻埕地區重要信仰中心。
history.en: Founded in 1856, a major religious center in Dadaocheng.

address.zh-TW: 台北市松山區八德路四段761號
address.en: No. 761, Bade Rd. Sec. 4, Songshan District, Taipei City

description.zh-TW: 松山地區重要媽祖廟，香火鼎盛。
description.en: A major Mazu temple in Songshan, Taipei, with thriving worship.

history.en: Founded in 1753, with a long history.

address.zh-TW: 台北市大同區哈密街61號
address.en: No. 61, Hami St, Datong District, Taipei City

description.zh-TW: 主祀保生大帝，醫藥之神，世界文化遺產潛力點。
description.en: Dedicated to Baosheng Dadi, god of medicine, a potential World Heritage site.

history.zh-TW: 創建於清朝，為台北重要古蹟。
history.en: Founded in the Qing Dynasty, an important historical site in Taipei.
